long_description: Easy to install without tools, the removable Yakima truck-bed rack keeps 2 bikes upright and secure to protect them, and your truck bed, on the bumpiest drives. Installs easily in 1 minute with no drilling required; foam pads protect your truck's paint job. Strong, easy-to-use fork-mount style bike attachments. Corrosion-resistant, heavy-duty steel construction combines strength with reliability. The Yakima truck-bed rack fits compact, mid-range and full-size trucks, and is fully compatible with bedliners.
short_description: Easy to install without tools, the removable Yakima truck-bed rack keeps 2 bikes upright and secure to protect them, and your truck bed, on the bumpiest drives.
